title: President Donald J. Trump Is Combating Lawlessness In America’s Cities – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
September 2, 2020
America needs creation, not destruction; cooperation, not contempt; security, not anarchy; healing, not hatred; justice, not chaos. This is our mission, and we will succeed.
						President Donald J. Trump					DEFENDING AMERICAN COMMUNITIES: President Donald J. Trump is taking action to protect American communities from rioting, violence, and destruction.
